section.section:
With the approval of the Governor and the State Archivist, the Commission may accept, on behalf of the State:
a gift of any painting or other object of decorative art; and
a loan of any painting or other object of decorative art.
The Commission shall care for any object of decorative art accepted under this section.

text.section:
With the approval of the Governor, the State Archivist:
may accept a gift of money from any public or private source; and
shall administer and use the gift of money in accordance with any conditions of the gift.
